name: Evening Chocolate Tour
description: In 2010 we christened this the “Evening Chocolate Tour”, but it could better be described as "the best of chocolate everything". Rather than just chocolates you would find in a typical chocolate box (truffles, pralines, caramels, fondants), you'll sample the best of chocolate in all its forms: from a freshly roasted cocoa bean to chocolate bars, hot chocolate, gelato, a you-won’t-believe-it’s-dairy-free sorbet, truffles, brownies and a bespoke chocolate cocktail in a secluded London bar.
